compliance.subtitle: Ensure safety and regulatory compliance

modules.title: Knowledge Base Modules
modules.description: Nine core modules covering the full lifecycle of maker spaces, each with three layers: Core (quick start), Extended (deep learning), and Evidence (academic support)

architecture.title: Three-Layer Content Architecture
architecture.description: Each module adopts the same three-layer structure to meet different learning depth needs

core.title: Core Layer
core.description: Essential knowledge and key principles, quickly grasp module essentials

extend.title: Extended Layer
extend.description: Deep topics and best practices for advanced learning

evidence.title: Evidence Layer
evidence.description: Research support and references, academic verification and citation sources

tools.title: Supporting Tools
tools.description: AI-powered design and planning tools for easier creation

lab.title: AI Space Design Tools
lab.description: Design and visualize your lab space with AI assistance, intelligent configuration recommendations

livingModules.title: Living Modules
livingModules.subtitle: AI-Tracked Living Documentation System
livingModules.description: Four core philosophy modules tracking cutting-edge research to provide intellectual foundation for innovation labs

spaceAsEducator.title: Space Shaping
spaceAsEducator.subtitle: Neuroarchitecture and Innovation Environment Design
spaceAsEducator.description: Space shapes people, people shape space—a bidirectional process. From neuroarchitecture to Third Space 2.0, understanding how physical environments affect cognition, behavior, and creativity.

extendedMind.title: Extended Mind
extendedMind.subtitle: AI-Enhanced Cognition and Learning Science
extendedMind.description: AI as cognitive exoskeleton—extending human capabilities rather than replacing human thinking. Exploring the optimal balance of human-AI collaboration and developing core competencies for the AI era.

emergentWisdom.title: Emergent Wisdom
emergentWisdom.subtitle: Community Dynamics and Collaborative Cognition
emergentWisdom.description: Communities are incubators of wisdom—individual intelligence is amplified, recombined, and evolved within communities. From psychological safety to cognitive diversity, understanding the emergence mechanisms of collective intelligence.

poeticsOfTechnology.title: Poetics of Technology
poeticsOfTechnology.subtitle: Embodied Tools and Post-Screen Era
poeticsOfTechnology.description: Technology should 'disappear'—the best technology makes you forget technology exists. From embodied learning to repairability, rethinking the relationship between tools and humans.

threeLayerNav.title: Knowledge System Navigation
threeLayerNav.description: Three interconnected knowledge layers, from philosophy to practice

actionTools.title: Action Layer Tools
actionTools.subtitle: AI-Powered Practice Tools
actionTools.tagline: Research has no boundaries, curiosity is the starting point
actionTools.tagline2: Everything can be researched; everyone can participate; research happens everywhere
actionTools.description: Intelligent bridges from philosophy to practice, making it easier to create and manage maker spaces

habitat.title: OWL Habitat
habitat.subtitle: A sanctuary for creators, an ecosystem for creativity
habitat.description: A living entity with soul, memory, and dreams. 6 AI tools, 38 intelligent agents, building an organic creative ecosystem.

spaceDesigner.title: AI Space Designer
spaceDesigner.description: Smart layout generation, 3D visualization, Allen curve analysis, one-click professional lab design

researchTeam.title: Virtual Research Team
researchTeam.description: Build cross-school research groups, assign roles and tasks, collaboratively explore real research problems

gameWorkshop.title: Game Workshop
gameWorkshop.description: Design gamified course activities, generate learning path maps, create achievement badge systems

connector.title: Wisdom Connector
connector.description: Discover OWL node networks, explore cross-disciplinary connections, match like-minded explorers

showcaseGenerator.title: Showcase Generator
showcaseGenerator.description: AI auto-generates project posters, research summaries, presentation slides to make your work shine

opensourceHub.title: Open Source Hub
opensourceHub.description: Curated navigation of open hardware, software, and curriculum resources - a community-contributed treasure trove

community.title: Join the Community
community.description: OWL is an open source project, welcome to contribute your experience and wisdom

footer.aiSpaceDesc: Intelligent documentation system built with Next.js and Fumadocs

M01.title: Curiosity Spark
M01.subtitle: Setting Sail
M01.label: Sparking Curiosity Through Theory
M01.description: Why do kids keep asking 'why'? Because curiosity is humanity's original learning engine! From the 4P theory of 'learn while playing' to the constructionist wisdom of 'hands make minds' — here lies the secret recipe for making learning fun. Ready to transform boring classrooms into exciting explorations?
highlights: Hands make minds: Knowledge isn't poured in — it's built through doing
4P Magic Formula: Projects + Passion + Peers + Play = Creativity unleashed
Design Thinking Loop: Empathize → Define → Brainstorm → Prototype → Test — your universal problem-solving key

M02.title: Social Owl
M02.subtitle: Innovation Network
M02.label: Smart Labs & Ecosystem Networks
M02.slogan: Alone we go fast, together we go far
M02.description: The era of going solo is over! Imagine: your cool project in Beijing can be seen by peers in Shenzhen; mentors in Shanghai can guide students in Chengdu remotely. That's the magic of the OWL network — connecting innovation labs like a web, sharing resources, exchanging experiences, growing stronger together!
highlights: Three-tier network: Hub HQ sets standards, regional Spokes provide support, school Satellites adapt flexibly
Flat operations: No bureaucracy, just do it — everyone is a co-builder
Cross-boundary collaboration: Schools + enterprises + communities, breaking walls, letting innovation resources flow

M03.title: Creative Portal
M03.subtitle: The Third Space
M03.label: Creativity-Inspiring Spaces
M03.slogan: Step through this door, creativity comes knocking
M03.description: Why do coffee shops spark more inspiration than classrooms? The secret is in space design! Good spaces 'talk' — quiet corners for deep thinking, collaboration tables for brainstorming, maker zones for building dreams. Plus a 'Failure Museum' celebrating those 'glorious crashes'!
highlights: Four-zone journey: Quiet thinking → Brainstorming → Hands-on making → Showcase stage — ideas become reality step by step
Online meets offline: Cloud collaboration, version control, knowledge base — work anytime, anywhere
Making growth visible: Work walls track progress, failure walls celebrate 'valuable mistakes', progress boards chase goals

M04.title: Explorer
M04.subtitle: Knowledge Routes
M04.label: Curriculum & Research Projects
M04.slogan: Learning is an adventure, not a checklist
M04.description: Who says learning must be step-by-step? The Explorer takes you on a real learning adventure! First figure out where you're going (goals), then how you'll know you've arrived (assessment), finally plan the route (activities). Light curiosity with real problems, let AI be your smart co-pilot, level up as you go!
highlights: Design backwards: Set the destination, imagine the evidence, then plan the path — that's smart curriculum design
Real problems, real outputs: From asking questions to public showcase, every project is for real
AI as teammate, not cheat code: Use it for brainstorming, guidance, analysis — but core thinking is yours

M05.title: Treasure Chest
M05.subtitle: Maker Workshop
M05.label: Methods, Tools & Assets
M05.description: From screwdrivers to laser cutters, from Arduino to 3D printers — this is maker paradise! Tiered tools let beginners start safely, digital fabrication turns wild ideas into real objects, and open hardware opens infinite possibilities. Best part: high-tech doesn't have to cost a fortune!
highlights: Safety levels: Green = free to use, Yellow = training needed, Orange = certified, Red = expert supervision — step by step, no pitfalls
Idea to reality: 3D modeling → Slicing → Materials → Printing → Finishing — complete digital manufacturing pipeline
Open ecosystem: Arduino, Raspberry Pi, ESP32, plus all kinds of sensors — whatever you want to build, there's a way

M06.title: Guardian Owl
M06.subtitle: Safety Code
M06.label: Lab Safety & Ethics
M06.slogan: Safety is the starting line, not the finish line
M06.description: Want to innovate boldly? First learn to protect yourself! These aren't scary rules — they're your armor for 'getting things done' safely. Physical safety prevents injuries, digital safety protects privacy, AI ethics guides responsible tech use. With these guardrails, you can truly let your imagination fly!
highlights: Three-layer shield: Equipment won't hurt, data won't leak, AI won't go rogue — all-around protection
Risk traffic lights: Green = go ahead, Yellow = be careful, Orange = proceed with caution, Red = stop — crystal clear
AI citizen code: Transparent, explainable, fair, privacy-protecting — be a responsible citizen of the AI era

M07.title: Torch Bearer
M07.subtitle: Lighting the Way
M07.label: Faculty Training & Capability Building
M07.slogan: Not teaching, but lighting a fire
M07.description: The best teachers don't know everything — they ignite students' curiosity! From watching and learning to standing alone, from tech newbie to all-round mentor, here's a clear growth map. The key: mentors must stay curious too, because the best education is 'exploring together'!
highlights: Four-step ladder: Watch and learn → Assist → Work independently → Mentor others — become a master step by step
3D capability model: Tech skills + Teaching skills + Community skills — well-rounded, no weak spots
Keep evolving: Beginner → Intermediate → Advanced → Expert certification — learning never stops, teaching never stops

M08.title: Navigator
M08.subtitle: Operations Log
M08.label: Sustainable Operations Manual
M08.slogan: Turn good practices into good habits
M08.description: Great labs don't run on inspiration — they run on reliable systems! How to run open days? Manage equipment? Keep the community alive? Here you'll find 'foolproof' guides for everything. More importantly, cultivate a culture of 'dare to try, love to share, help each other' — that's the real moat!
highlights: SOPs anyone can follow: From welcoming guests to closing checks, every scenario has a playbook
Member leveling up: Newcomer → Learner → Member → Core → Mentor — responsibilities grow with privileges
Culture beats rules: Open, sharing, failure-friendly, respectful collaboration — giving the space a soul

M09.title: Growth Tree
M09.subtitle: Growth Portfolio
M09.label: Long-term Development & Impact
M09.slogan: Every step of growth deserves to be seen
M09.description: Test scores are just the tip of the iceberg! What really matters: Do you dare to ask questions? Can you collaborate? Can you bounce back from failure? Here we capture your growth from multiple angles — projects, reflections, peer reviews, digital profiles — making progress visible, tangible, and proudly shareable!
highlights: 360° portrait: Tech + Creativity + Collaboration + Reflection — not just scores, but how you grow
Growth portfolio: Project collection, process logs, reflection journals, peer kudos — your complete learning journey
Digital growth curve: Knowledge maps, skill radars, growth charts, milestone badges — data telling your story
